detectors.description: Airdrop.redeemTokens() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdrop__3.sol#206-213) ignores return value by token.transfer(msg.sender,balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdrop__3.sol#211)

Airdrop.transferTokens(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdrop__3.sol#221-223) ignores return value by token.transfer(_address,_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdrop__3.sol#222)

Airdrop.Airdrop(address[],address,uint256).owners (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdrop__3.sol#173) shadows:
	- Owned.owners (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdrop__3.sol#45) (state variable)

Reentrancy in Airdrop.redeemTokens() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdrop__3.sol#206-213):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdrop__3.sol#211)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Redeemed(msg.sender,balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdrop__3.sol#212)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Airdrop.redeemTokens()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdrop__3.sol#L206-L213):
